jobs.title: Member of Technical Staff, Design & Frontend Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Inkeep

We're building the future of AI agents for customer experience. Our customers include leading AI companies like Anthropic and Midjourney, plus high-growth startups like PostHog and Postman who trust us to deliver best-in-class AI experiences to their users. We're backed by Khosla Ventures and Y Combinator, growing quickly, and looking for exceptional people who want to work at the forefront of AI.

About the role

As a Design Engineer (MTS), you'll own user experiences end-to-end, from concept to shipped product. You'll work directly with customers, influence product direction, and build the interfaces that define how millions of users interact with AI. This isn't a typical design or engineering role. You'll:

  • Ship full features independently: engineer, build, and iterate based on real user feedback

  • Work directly with customers: understand their needs deeply and validate solutions with them

  • Shape product direction: your design and technical insights will directly influence our roadmap

  • Build in public: see your work used by users at some of the world's leading AI companies within days

What we're looking for

  • Strong design sensibility: you have excellent product intuition and can use tools like Figma to communicate ideas

  • Solid engineering chops: 3+ years building user-facing products with TypeScript (React/Next.js or similar frameworks)

  • Customer empathy: you care deeply about understanding user needs and building delightful experiences

  • High ownership: you want to own problems end-to-end, not just work on tickets

Bonus points for

  • Open source contributions or public projects that show your craft

  • Experience building AI products or developer tools

  • Strong opinions on what makes great product experiences

Why join us

  • High impact: your work will be used by millions of users at companies you admire

  • Learning: work on cutting-edge AI technology with a fast, technical team

  • Ownership: we're small enough that you'll have massive influence on product and company direction

  • Growth: as an MTS, you're on a technical leadership track from day one

jobs.title: Solutions Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About us

At Inkeep, we're building the future of AI agents for customer experience.

We work with leading AI companies like Anthropic and Midjourney as well as high-growth tech companies like PostHog and Postman. Our customers trust Inkeep to help them provide a world-class support experience for their users and a force multiplier for their employees.

We're growing quickly and looking for new team members who like working at the forefront of AI with a fast and smart team with high levels of ownership and impact.


Our investors include Khosla Ventures and Y Combinator.

About the role

Our customers are often highly technical teams who embed Inkeep-powered AI assistants into their docs, help center, or inside of their apps -- virtually at any touch point and in any workflow. A key pillar of our product is the developer platform, which includes extensible UI components, AI and RAG APIs, and other developer-first primitives. Our customers create AI copilots, agents, and workflows on top of our platform, and in this role, you'll be partnering with them on that journey.

The role involves being high-touch with customers to help them succeed. If you want to become an expert on how companies embed AI systems into their customer experiences and their internal workflows, Inkeep is a great fit.

Responsibilities

  • Onboard and support customers through paid pilots

  • Create templates, quickstarts, and other technical onboarding artifacts

  • Use AI to make your work more efficient and our customers' lives easier

Qualifications

  • 2+ years in solutions/sales engineering, support engineering, or other engineering roles with customer-facing responsibilities

  • Strong experience with TypeScript (Python experience is a plus)

  • Strong communication and organizational skills

  • Located in NYC or willing to relocate (this role is in-office 5 days a week)

Bonus if you have...

  • Experience with technical writing

  • Experience working at a developer tool company


Benefits

  • Health, Dental, and Vision insurance

  • Unlimited PTO

compensationTiers.tierSummary: On Target Earnings $120K – $180K • Offers Equity • Offers Commission

jobs.title: Member of Technical Staff, Principal TypeScript Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Member of Technical Staff, Principal TypeScript Engineer

About Inkeep We're making AI agents accessible to any team with our Agent Platform. Our customers include leading AI companies like Anthropic and Midjourney, plus high-growth startups like PostHog and Postman who use our platform to build best-in-class AI experiences and automate workflows for their teams.

We're backed by Khosla Ventures and Y Combinator, growing quickly, and looking for exceptional engineers who want to work at the edge of AI technology with a fast, technical team.

About the role As a Principal TypeScript Engineer (MTS), you'll architect and ship the core features that power our Agent Platform. You'll have significant ownership over how thousands of developers build AI agents, from API design to SDK ergonomics to the abstractions that make agentic systems easy to build.

This is a high-leverage role where you'll:

  • Own platform features end-to-end: architect, build, and maintain critical systems that our customers depend on

  • Shape the developer experience: design APIs, SDKs, and tools that developers love to use

  • Work directly with customers: understand how teams build AI agents and design elegant solutions for their needs

  • Influence product direction: your technical and product insights will directly shape our roadmap

  • Build at the frontier: work on cutting-edge agentic systems and see your work used in production at leading AI companies

What we're looking for

  • Strong TypeScript expertise: 4+ years building full-stack products with TypeScript, with deep understanding of web fundamentals

  • System design skills: you can architect APIs and systems that are elegant, scalable, and developer-friendly

  • Product thinking: you care about the end-user experience and think through how people will actually use what you build

  • Full-stack fluency: comfortable working across the stack, from APIs to SDKs to UIs

  • High ownership: you want to own problems deeply, not just write code

Bonus points for

  • Experience building with AI (prompts, evals, RAG, agentic workflows, etc.)

  • Background in developer tools or B2B SaaS products

  • Open source contributions or public projects that demonstrate your craft

  • UX or design sensibility

Our craft-driven culture We expect every engineer to have strong product intuition and to think through the complete user experience. If you love building for other developers and are excited about building end-to-end agentic systems in TypeScript, you'll thrive here.

Why join us

  • High impact: shape the platform that powers AI agents for leading companies

  • Technical depth: work on complex, challenging problems at the frontier of AI

  • Ownership: as an MTS Principal Engineer, you'll have significant influence on technical direction

  • Learning: get deep insight into how the best teams build and deploy AI agents

jobs.title: Senior Full Stack Engineer, AI Agents (TypeScript)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About us

At Inkeep, we're making AI agents accessible to any team with our Agent Platform.

Our customers include top AI companies, like Anthropic and Midjourney, and high-growth tech companies like PostHog and Postman.

Our customers want the best AI assistant experience possible for their users and to use AI to automate workflows and as a force multiplier for their teams.

We're growing quickly and looking for new team members who like working at edge of tech-- with a fast and smart team.


Our investors include Khosla Ventures and Y Combinator.

About the role

We're looking for a senior-level+ engineer who is exceptional technically but also enjoys creating elegant solutions to complex scenarios. In this role, you'll have large ownership in helping shape our Agent Platform by shipping and owning features end-to-end and architecting new facets of the platform.

In this role, you'll get an in-depth view into how our customers build AI agents and help architect the technology and tools they need to do that.

Craft-driven Culture

We expect every engineer to have great product intuition and think through the end-user experience, from API to SDKs to UIs. If you love building for others and are excited about building end-to-end agentic systems (in TypeScript), this role is a great fit.

Required Qualifications

  • 4+ years in a full-stack, front-end, or app development role that leveraged TypeScript.

  • Strong API and system design skills.

  • Fluent with web fundamentals and full-stack development

Bonus

  • Experience building with AI (prompts, evals, RAG, etc.)

  • Worked on a B2B SaaS or developer tool product

  • Open source contributions or interesting public projects

  • Experience with CI/CD and DevOps

  • UX or graphic design skills
jobs.descriptionPlain:
ABOUT US

At Inkeep https://inkeep.com, we're making AI agents accessible to any team with our Agent Platform.

Our customers include top AI companies, like Anthropic and Midjourney, and high-growth tech companies like PostHog and Postman.

Our customers want the best AI assistant experience possible for their users and to use AI to automate workflows and as a force multiplier for their teams.

We're growing quickly and looking for new team members who like working at edge of tech-- with a fast and smart team.


Our investors include Khosla Ventures and Y Combinator.


ABOUT THE ROLE

We're looking for a senior-level+ engineer who is exceptional technically but also enjoys creating elegant solutions to complex scenarios. In this role, you'll have large ownership in helping shape our Agent Platform by shipping and owning features end-to-end and architecting new facets of the platform.

In this role, you'll get an in-depth view into how our customers build AI agents and help architect the technology and tools they need to do that.





CRAFT-DRIVEN CULTURE

We expect every engineer to have great product intuition and think through the end-user experience, from API to SDKs to UIs. If you love building for others and are excited about building end-to-end agentic systems (in TypeScript), this role is a great fit.

Required Qualifications

 - 4+ years in a full-stack, front-end, or app development role that leveraged TypeScript.

 - Strong API and system design skills.

 - Fluent with web fundamentals and full-stack development

Bonus

 - Experience building with AI (prompts, evals, RAG, etc.)

 - Worked on a B2B SaaS or developer tool product

 - Open source contributions or interesting public projects

 - Experience with CI/CD and DevOps

 - UX or graphic design skills

jobs.title: Content Engineer (Video Content Creator)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About us

At Inkeep, we're building the future of AI agents for customer experience.

We work with leading AI companies, like Anthropic and Midjourney, and high-growth tech companies like PostHog and Postman. Our customers want the best AI assistant experience possible for their users and to use AI as a force-multiplier for their team.

We're growing quickly and looking for new team members who like working at the forefront of technology, with a fast and smart team, and enjoy high levels of ownership and impact.


Our investors include Khosla Ventures and Y Combinator.

About the role

We're looking for a content video creator who's a storyteller and engineer at heart. You'll be responsible for helping showcase our product across various modern marketing channels while telling our customers' stories—and ours. Our product is compelling to all types of roles, from VPs of Support to CTOs, so having empathy with how modern SaaS companies operate and being able to speak to the needs of multiple personas via visual assets is key.

The types of content will include product launch videos, onboarding content, and other marketing and educational content. The product is a software and developer tool product, so the majority of content will revolve around how to showcase the product.

Responsibilities

  • Incorporating graphics, video, and animations into social media and marketing collateral

  • Filming product demos for product launches and our sales collateral

  • Creating educational content to help with our support and onboarding processes

Qualifications

  • 3+ years as a video content creator.

  • 2+ years experience with motion graphics and animations for product launch videos

  • 2+ years working at or on projects related to technical SaaS products

  • Can speak to or relate with highly technical audiences.

Bonus

  • Experience with graphic design.

  • Experience in content writing, growth, developer relations, or related marketing roles.

  • Experience with early-stage, high-growth startups.
